column1: '''The Ring Goes South''' is the eleventh track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. As it is played
column2: the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Fellowship]] travels South
column3: passing [[Ost-in-Edhil]] and approaching [[Moria]]. It is completely instrumental.
